name: mirror_matchers
comment:
The mirror matchers library provides some additional matchers that make use of dart:mirrors.

Installing

Use pub to install this package. Add the following to your pubspec.yaml file.

dependencies:
  unittest: any

Then run pub install.

Import this into your Dart code with:

import 'package:unittest/mirror_matchers.dart';

For more information, see the unittest package on pub.dartlang.org. (http://pub.dartlang.org/packages/unittest).

hasProperty.name: hasProperty
hasProperty.comment: Returns a matcher that checks if a class instance has a property with name unittest/mirror_matchers.hasProperty.name, and optionally, if that property in turn satisfies a unittest/mirror_matchers.hasProperty.matcher.
